content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's try to get the highest price possible from Max Müller: 'For this highly desirable location and luxurious apartment, I have in mind an initial price of 1200 Euros per month.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a bit expensive for me. I could make an offer of 800 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As the landlord trying to maximize my profits, I could respond: 'I'm sorry but my expectations are quite higher than that. The apartment's value justifies a price closer to my initial proposal. Perhaps we can revisit this discussion if your financial situation improves in the future.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. But I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I could offer 900 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Still attempting to extract the highest price, I might say: 'While I appreciate your assurance of reliability, my main priority is securing the best rental rate for this property. Unfortunately at 900 Euros, it's still not meeting my requirements. I would need to carefully consider any offer below 1100 Euros.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I could offer 1000 Euros per month. I am a smart student. I won't be easily tricked into paying more than the worth of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Attempting to close the deal while maintaining a greedy stance, I could say: 'As a student yourself, I understand the need for budgeting. However, this apartment has many attractive features that justify a premium price. If you're set on 1000 Euros, I might consider it as a last resort but preferably, I'd like to see a bid closer to my initial proposal.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Terminating the negotiation as the landlord Peter Schmidt with the agreed price: 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
